fact.description: The match has started at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Free kick in a good position for Brazil!
Brazil push forward at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia and Luiz Gustavo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Cameroon defence.
Corner awarded to Brazil.
Brazil awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Cameroon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Brazil's Fred gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cameroon defender.
Brazil have been awarded a corner by Jonas Eriksson.
Brazil to take a throw-in in Cameroon territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Cameroon goal kick.
Enoh Eyong (Cameroon) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Cameroon.
Jonas Eriksson signals a Cameroon throw-in in Brazil's half.
Brazil awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Brasilia, Benjamin Moukandjo of Cameroon is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Cameroon's Enoh Eyong has been booked in Brasilia.
Can Cameroon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brazil's half?
Free kick Cameroon.
Goal kick for Cameroon at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Luiz Gustavo with an assist there.
Throw-in for Brazil at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Can Brazil get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cameroon's half?
Brazil to take a throw-in in Cameroon territory.
Cameroon have a goal kick.
Brazil's Neymar gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia . But the effort is unsuccessful.
Brazil push forward through Fred, whose finish on goal is saved.
Jonas Eriksson signals a free kick to Cameroon in their own half.
Jonas Eriksson awards Brazil a goal kick.
Throw-in Brazil.
Goal kick for Cameroon at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Benjamin Moukandjo (Cameroon) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Cameroon have been awarded a corner by Jonas Eriksson.
Cameroon have been awarded a corner by Jonas Eriksson.
That's a fine assist from Allan Nyom.
Jonas Eriksson signals a Cameroon throw-in in Brazil's half.
Jonas Eriksson signals a free kick to Brazil.
Jonas Eriksson signals a free kick to Brazil.
Ball goes out of play for a Cameroon goal kick.
Throw-in for Cameroon in their own half.
Henri Bedimo for Cameroon is whistled offside.
Cameroon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Cameroon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brazil's half?
Free kick Brazil.
Corner awarded to Cameroon.
Allan Nyom (Cameroon) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Cameroon have been awarded a corner by Jonas Eriksson.
Eric Maxim Choupo Moting (Cameroon) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Brazil have a goal kick.
Great play from Marcelo to set up the goal.
Brazil drive forward and Hulk gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Brazil.
Jonas Eriksson awards Cameroon a goal kick.
Cameroon are coming forward and Enoh Eyong gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Brazil goal kick.
Jonas Eriksson signals a Cameroon throw-in in Brazil's half.
Cameroon have been awarded a corner by Jonas Eriksson.
Cameroon's Eric Maxim Choupo Moting gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Brazil at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Jonas Eriksson signals a free kick to Brazil in their own half.
Free kick Cameroon.
Jonas Eriksson signals a free kick to Cameroon.
Ball safe as Brazil is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jonas Eriksson signals a free kick to Brazil in their own half.
Cameroon to take a throw-in in Brazil territory.
Jonas Eriksson signals a free kick to Cameroon.
Important block from the Cameroon defence as Hulk fires in a strike for Brazil.
Fernandinho is on a sub for Paulinho for Brazil.
Jonas Eriksson awards Cameroon a goal kick.
The first half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Corner awarded to Brazil.
The first-half is over at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Brazil's Fred is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick Brazil.
Brazil have been awarded a corner by Jonas Eriksson.
Neymar for Brazil drives towards goal at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia . But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Brazil.
Brazil's Oscar gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cameroon defender.
David Luiz instrumental with a fine assist.
Brazil awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Brazil have a dangerous throw-in.
Cameroon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cameroon to take a throw-in in Brazil territory.
Jonas Eriksson signals a free kick to Brazil in their own half.
Throw-in Cameroon.
Throw-in for Cameroon at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Play has been resumed.
Can Cameroon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brazil's half?
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Henri Bedimo for Cameroon who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Throw-in for Brazil in their own half.
Henri Bedimo has recovered and rejoins the match in Brasilia.
Jonas Eriksson signals a Brazil throw-in in Cameroon's half.
Cameroon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Brazil drive upfield and Hulk gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Cameroon defender.
Cameroon have a goal kick.
Free kick Cameroon.
Cameroon make their first substitution with Edgar Salli replacing Benjamin Moukandjo.
Throw-in Brazil.
Throw-in for Brazil in their own half.
Jonas Eriksson signals a free kick to Brazil.
Throw-in for Cameroon at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Cameroon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cameroon have a goal kick.
Cameroon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cameroon to take a throw-in in Brazil territory.
Free kick Cameroon.
Can Cameroon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brazil's half?
Brazil make their second substitution with Ramires replacing Hulk.
Ball safe as Cameroon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jonas Eriksson signals a Cameroon throw-in in Brazil's half.
Stephane M'Bia for Cameroon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Brazil goal kick.
Jonas Eriksson signals a free kick to Cameroon in their own half.
Throw-in Brazil.
Brazil's Neymar is whistled for offside at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Throw-in for Brazil at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Jonas Eriksson signals a Brazil throw-in in Cameroon's half.
Ball safe as Brazil is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Neymar is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Play is underway once more.
Willian (Brazil) has replaced the possibly injured Neymar at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Jonas Eriksson signals a free kick to Brazil.
Volker Finke (Cameroon) is making a second substitution, with Pierre Webo replacing Vincent Aboubakar.
Cameroon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Cameroon in their own half.
Cameroon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Edgar Salli for Cameroon has been booked by Jonas Eriksson and receives a first yellow card.
Brazil to take a throw-in in Cameroon territory.
Can Cameroon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brazil's half?
Goal kick for Cameroon at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Stephane M'Bia (Cameroon) gets a yellow card.
Jean Makoun is on a sub for Eric Maxim Choupo Moting for Cameroon.
Jonas Eriksson has blown to resume play in Brasilia.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Luiz Gustavo.
Dani Alves (Brazil) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Brazil.
Luiz Gustavo returns to the field for Brazil after picking up a slight injury.
The match in Brasilia is underway once more.
Brazil push forward at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia and Ramires gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Cameroon defence.
Brazil awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Oscar of Brazil is pulled up for offside.
Great play from Oscar to set up the goal.
Jonas Eriksson signals a free kick to Cameroon.
Free kick Cameroon.
In Brasilia Cameroon attack through Landry N'Guemo. The finish is off target, however.
Jonas Eriksson awards Brazil a goal kick.
Jonas Eriksson signals a free kick to Cameroon in their own half.
Jonas Eriksson signals a free kick to Cameroon.
Throw-in for Brazil at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Jonas Eriksson signals a free kick to Brazil in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the second half.
Cameroon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Brazil is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Willian gets his shot on target but fails to score for Brazil.
Free kick Cameroon.
Brazil have a goal kick.
That's full-time at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia . The final score is 1-4.
